website_summaries.verdict: The Apple iPhone 6s may look just like its predecessor, but it offers up some real advantages that make the iPhone experience better.
pros: Much better LTE reception than iPhone 6

website_summaries.verdict: The Apple iPhone 6s turbocharges the iPhone experience on Sprint, making it an essential upgrade.
pros: Much faster on Sprint's Spark network than previous iPhones

customer_reviews.title: 2 of the 3 phones where really great, however one was smashed on the back and ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the 3 phones where really great, however one was smashed on the back and all of them where described as "very good" an 8/10. I think that one doesn't belong to that category and I paid more for that phone than what I should.

customer_reviews.title: Worst decision of my life
customer_reviews.text: Never gonna by from this seller. After the first week phone starts getting freeze. From outside it’s good but inside hardware is worst. Touch keep getting unresponsive 10times a day. After a month it’s keep getting shut down. Battery life is an hour and heats up too much. The worst part is no positive response from the seller

What a total waste of my money .. and it has to be a fault of the phone that I was sold as I know persons who have the iPhone 6s and it works perfectly!!

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Great price!!! The only downfall is the sound from the ear hole when on the phone is very very low. Charger and SIM card pin included. Packaging was well put together. Karen answered all my questions.

customer_reviews.title: Not brand new. Don't buy. Waste of money

Stand-by time is 5 hours. When you disconnect the charger during the charging, it shuts down...lots of problems and totally waste of money. ***STAY AWAY***

I made the purchase with the guarantee of being a new and free phone. How can we solve this situation? Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. LOVE

The only downside is that the home button I brought was a little bit weird but I got over it. It's a bit as if... Every time I barely press the button there's a pre-click forwarded by me pressing to initiate the original click sound. But it goes away. Once again, LOVE!

The ourchasing date is a year back - this is not fair for someone who has purchased the phone new.

It turned on just once, 3D touch wasn't responding that well and Phone is completely dead now. I'm not even sure if this phone is apple's real&original product. Amazon is refusing to replace an item and also problems about refund. I'm soo dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: They get better with every release....
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says. The camera is a lot better than the 6. The size is a bit long but still in the ballpark. I like the OS. Very reliable. Touch log in works perfectly. If it was only waterproof.....
customer_reviews.author: Alanwrench

customer_reviews.title: Big Brother is watching you.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife who has been an Apple PC fan since 1988. However, she actually misses her Burner flip-phone. She's a bit of a Luddite. In spite of this, the phone was exactly as advertised and the seller was excellent. The product is mediocre. And my wife hates the idea of Apple knowing her every move.
customer_reviews.author: kaon

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone 6s 16 GB US Domestic Warranty Unlocked Cellphone - Retail Packaging (Space Gray)
feature_bullets: Keep everything you love about iPhone up to date, secure, and accessible from any device withiCloud.
With just a single press, 3D Touch lets you do more than ever before.
The 12-megapixel iSight camera captures sharp, detailed photos. It takes 4K video, up to four times the resolution of 1080p HD video.
iPhone 6s is powered by the custom-designed 64-bit A9 chip.- delivers 70% more CPU performance

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars255 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Other camera features: 8 MP Back Camera, 1.2 MP Front Camera
